title: Issue detail panel on click
description: Clicking an issue in the table or dashboard should expand a detail panel showing description, comments, and dependencies. Currently all that data is in issues.json but not rendered anywhere.

title: Activity timeline view
description: A third view tab showing issue activity over time — created, updated, closed. Gives a sense of project velocity without needing an external tool. Data is already in issues.json timestamps.

title: Keyboard navigation
description: Arrow keys to navigate issues, Enter to expand detail, Escape to close. j/k vim-style movement. Dashboard is already a single-page app — just needs keybindings wired up.

title: Add dashboard preview to README
description: Add a screenshot or live demo link to README.md showing what beadspace looks like. Both light and dark mode. People should see what they're installing before they install it.
close_reason: Added dark, light, and issues table screenshots to README

title: Dogfood beadspace on the beadspace repo
description: Install beadspace into its own repo. Set up GitHub Pages so the beadspace project tracks its own issues with its own dashboard. Meta, but useful — we eat our own cooking.
close_reason: Installed beadspace on itself, enabled GitHub Pages

title: Dependency graph visualization
description: Render issue dependencies as a simple directed graph. issues.json already has the dependency data. Could use CSS-only layout or minimal inline SVG — no external libs.
